name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Eclectic Sounds and Global Voices**

Best Kept Secret 2026 brings together a diverse lineup of 52 artists, showcasing an impressive range of genres and styles. From the pulsating beats of electronic and house to the raw edge of post-punk and alternative rock, the festival offers something for every music lover. Genres like hip-hop, indie rock, and soul also make significant appearances, illustrating the festival’s commitment to eclectic programming. With an average rating of 7.2 based on 76.9% of the lineup, the festival promises a well-curated experience for its attendees.

The lineup is a testament to global representation, with artists hailing from 16 countries. While the USA and the Netherlands lead the pack, acts from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and Tanzania add a rich cultural diversity to the mix. Gender representation sees a varied spread, with male artists forming the majority, but female, non-binary, and mixed-gender acts also making their presence felt. Additionally, 12 artists identify as people of color, contributing to the festival’s inclusive ethos.

With 98.1% of the lineup featuring Spotify links, fans can easily explore and connect with the music before the festival. Best Kept Secret 2026 continues to uphold its reputation as a platform for discovery, blending established and emerging talent from around the world to create a vibrant and inclusive celebration of music.
